PSCT.Base: While this card is equipped to a monster: You can equip 1 "Infernoble Arms" Equip Spell from your Deck or GY, except ""Infernoble Arms - Almace"", to 1 appropriate monster you control, then destroy this card. If this card is sent to the GY because the equipped monster is sent to the GY: You can target 1 of your FIRE Warrior monsters that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 ""Infernoble Arms - Almace"" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
